hints.none:
Tulips surround me
Originally a pump
Now just a landmark
hints.small: There are two windmills in the park. They were built to pump water for irrigating the park. But only one has a tulip garden!
hints.big: If you're still stuck the sticker may be missing. It should be on a bench by the Dutch Windmill.

hints.none:
Cheering audience
Running, biking and playing
In the stands I sit
hints.small: Look around the polo field. Where would you sit there?
hints.big: If you're still stuck the sticker may be missing. It should be in the upper row of the stands.

hints.none:
Six columns of stone
I watch on from the sidelines
Bit of history
hints.small: Look around the Portals of the Past monument.
hints.big: If you're still stuck the sticker may be missing. It should be on a bench by Lloyd Lake.

hints.none:
A measure above
Water falls underneath me
No bridge is too far
hints.small: Climb to the top of Strawberry Hill.
hints.big: If you're still stuck the sticker may be missing. It should be on the highest bridge on Strawberry Hill.

hints.none:
Floating on water
Lillium? No relation
Seated relaxing
hints.big: If you're still stuck the sticker may be missing. It should be on a bench by the Lily Pond.
